DocDetails.description: Issuer can add meta content specific to document here.

DOB.description: The date of birth if sent in the original request.

DataContent.description: Enclose the base64 byte encoded certificate metadata in XML format. The DataContent element should be sent only if the original request contains format attribute as “xml” or “both”.

DigiLockerId.description: A unique 36 character DigiLocker Id as sent in the original request.

DocContent.description: Enclose the Base64 byte encoded contents of PDF file in this element.

DocType.description: The document type sent in the original request.

FullName.description: The full name if sent in the original request.

UDF1.description: Search parameters sent in the original request.

UDF2.description: Search parameters sent in the original request.

UID.description: The Aadhaar number if sent in the original request.

URI.description: URI corresponding to the search criteria that identifies the document uniquely.

Status.description: 1 for success, 0 for error and 9 for pending.

ts.description: A timestamp value as sent in the request.

txn.description: Transaction id value as sent in the request.

DocDetails.description: Issuer can add meta content specific to document here.

DataContent.description: Enclose the Base64 byte encoded certificate metadata in XML format. The DataContent element should be sent only if the original request contains format attribute as “xml” or “both”.

DocContent.description: Enclose the Base64 byte encoded contents of PDF file in this element. The DocContent element should be sent only if the format attribute in the original request is sent as “pdf” or “both” or is absent.

ts.description: A timestamp value as sent in the request.

txn.description: Transaction id value as sent in the request.
